title: Beautiful 1 E. Scott St. Studio for Rent - July OR August 1,22
posting_body: ['Beautiful Gold Coast - Available July  1, or Aug 1, 22 A beautiful,  spacious Studio', 'This lovely Studio located on the 13th floor has magnificent views of State Street and John Hancock', 'No pets', '1 year lease', 'New windows-sound proof', 'Pool outdoors roof top, beautiful new furniture, decorated with pots of flowers and views of all of Chicago in every direction', 'Door man 24hrs', 'Laundry 24hrs with security', 'Storage available', 'Bike Storage available', 'Beautiful apartment, Kitchen with counter tops and double sink plenty of cabinet space.', 'Master walk in closet with new shelving', 'Bathroom, new vanity, lighting', 'Security deposit same as rent $1,250.00']
